name: Flexa
slogan: Where and when you work doesn't matter any more: join the flexible working revolution
description:
We want you to have a life, as well as a career.

Flexa is a job platform and online community that seamlessly introduces companies to those of us who want flexibility in our work. We partner with businesses of all sizes, who see flexible working as a way to give back to their employees.

jobs.title: Chief Marketing Officer
jobs.description:
The Role

At Flexa, we are on a mission to make finding flexible work easy. Currently, we are looking for someone to join our team and take responsibility for all marketing activity to grow our candidate base.

The successful applicant will be charged with owning candidate growth and retention; will be responsible for all our paid and owned media (Google Ads, Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram); will devise our CRM strategy and execute against it; and will play a key role in our consumer PR campaigns.

Please apply if...

- You are an expert in digital marketing, with a generalist skillset that can turn your hand to all digital channels
- You are data-driven and analytically minded
- You think in hypotheses and understand what success looks like
- You have experience in the hiring/recruitment market, or at least a reasonable degree of familiarity
- You have an entrepreneurial mindset
- You are happy to work in a small team of co-founders
- You have a passion for growing and scaling a business
- You aren’t afraid to get your hands dirty
- You want to work flexibly and believe that everybody should have the right to do so

Additionally, experience in a start-up would be highly advantageous, but by no means essential.

Initially, this role would suit someone interested in growing our candidate base on a part-time basis as it is rewarded solely through equity, with a view to transitioning to a full-time role in the near future. The role is based in London, but can be worked with a great degree of flexibility. There is equity on offer for the successful applicant.

We think this is a huge opportunity for a marketing specialist to transition into an entrepreneurial role at a very exciting point of the Flexa journey.

jobs.title: Chief Commercial Officer
jobs.description:
At Flexa, we are on a mission to make finding flexible work easy.

Currently, we are looking for someone to join our team and take responsibility for growing our corporate client business. The successful candidate will be charged with owning the client business end-to-end, including lead generation, conversion, retention, b2b communications and support.

Please apply if...

• You have significant experience in one or more of: recruitment, job sites/boards, B2B business development/sales

• You have a substantial and reliable network in the world of Talent Acquisition / Human Resources

• You have an entrepreneurial mindset

• You are happy to work in a small team of co-founders

• You have a passion for growing and scaling a business

• You aren’t afraid to get your hands dirty

• You have experience in working with and presenting to senior stakeholders (ExCo’s, investors, boards, etc.)

• You want to work flexibly and believe that everybody should have the right to do so

Additionally, experience in a start-up would be highly advantageous, but by no means essential.

Initially, this role would suit someone interested in growing our client arm on a part-time basis as it is rewarded solely through equity, with a view to transitioning to a full-time role in the near future. The role is based in London, but can be worked with a great degree of flexibility. There is equity on offer for the successful applicant.

We think this is a huge opportunity for a recruiter/BD specialist to transition into an entrepreneurial role at a very exciting point of the Flexa journey.
